name: Rock Paper Scissors Joust
description:
The year is 20xx. Professional gamers have perfect tech skill, and the games have been optimized and reduced to a game of Rock-Paper-Scissors.

Controls: Rock-Paper-Scissors

- Player 1 - A S D

- Player 2 - Left Down Right

Rules: First to take all five of their opponent's lives is the winner.

- Use one bar of meter to switch hands mid-joust.

- Losing builds 2 bars of meter. Winning builds 1 bar. Draws build 1.5 bars.

- Press the button of your current hand to activate your character's super move.
